alert.note: Alert for McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 6:06PM CDT until June 22 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Central Kansas, including the following county, McPherson. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is likely. Low-water crossings may not be passable. Street flooding is likely in towns. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 606 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low- lying and flood-prone locations is likely. Low-water crossings may not be passable. Street flooding is likely in towns. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area through 10 PM.
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown.
